content:
Let's create a morning routine that works for you.

**Regular Days (No Morning Meetings)**

1. Wake-up time: 7:30 am
2. Get ready (45 minutes): 7:30 am - 8:15 am
3. Eat oatmeal and enjoy breakfast (30 minutes): 7:45 am - 8:15 am
4. Get dressed, gather belongings, and head out the door: 8:15 am - 8:45 am
5. Leave for work: 8:45 am

**Days with Morning Meetings**

1. Wake-up time: 7:00 am
2. Get ready (45 minutes): 7:00 am - 7:45 am
3. Eat oatmeal and enjoy breakfast (30 minutes): 7:15 am - 7:45 am
4. Get dressed, gather belongings, and head out the door: 7:45 am - 8:15 am
5. Leave for work: 8:15 am (arriving 45 minutes before the meeting)

This routine allows you to wake up a bit earlier on days with morning meetings, ensuring you have enough time to get ready, eat your breakfast, and arrive at the meeting on time.

Feel free to adjust this routine to fit your personal preferences and pace. You may want to add some buffer time in case things take longer than expected or if you need some extra time to relax before leaving for work.

Remember, consistency is key, so try to stick to this routine as closely as possible, even on weekends or days off. This will help regulate your body's internal clock and make it easier to wake up and start your day feeling refreshed and energized.
